text: Sir David Okete Vuvuiri Vunagi, (5 September 1950 â€“ 7 March 2025) was a retired Solomon Islands Anglican bishop and politician. He was the governor- general of Solomon Islands from 2019 until 2024. He was also the archbishop of Melanesia and bishop of the Diocese of Central Melanesia from 2009 to 2015. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Governors- General of Solomon Islands
title: David Vunagi
